text: One can remember with horror the pictures of the overcrowded and over-embellished drawing-rooms complete with heavy crochet antimacassars, mantelpiece covers with a fringing of clumsy bobbles and numerous other crocheted pieces. It was some years after the Victorian period that designers realised the potentialities of the craft, and has a variety of uses, and has even stepped into the field of high fashion.
handwritten_text: One can remember with horror the pictures of the overcrowded and over-embellished drawing-rooms complete with heavy crochet antimacassars, mantelpiece covers with a fringing of clumsy bobbles and numerous other crocheted pieces. It was some years after the Victorian period that designers realised the potentialities of the craft, and has a variety of uses, and has even stepped into the field of high fashion.
